Apa itu AngularJS ??

 

  • AngularJS is not a library
  • AngularJS != jQuery
  • Framework Javascript untuk membangun aplikasi web

Kenapa Angular ??

 

  • Single Page Application (SPA)
  • Ukuran Core sangat kecil ~126Kb (minified version)
  • Dependency Injection system
  • Two-way data binding
  • Memiliki fitur lengkap
  • Mudah membangun aplikasi interaktif melalui animasi

    • ...

Membuat modul

// create a new module
angular.module('myApp',['ngRoute','ngAnimate']);

/* to invoke the module, just use */
var app = angular.module('myApp');


...

...

routing

// create a new module
var app = angular.module('myApp',['ngRoute']);

/* konfigurasi routing */
app.config(function($routeProvider){
  $routeProvider
  	.when('/',{
	   template:'
Hello World
'
	})
	.when('/posts', {
	   templateUrl:'views/posts.html',
	   controller: 'PostCtrl'
	})
	.when('/post/:id',{
	   templateUrl: 'views/single_post.html',
	   controller:'SinglePostCtrl',
	   resolve:{
	      return {
	      	getPost: function(BlogService, $routeParams){
	      		return BlogService.getOne($routeParams.id);
	      	}
	      }
	   }
	});

  $routeProvider.otherwise({
	redirectTo: '/'
  });
});
Two-way Data Binding

app.controller("HelloCtrl", function($scope){
	// initialize 'myModule' value
	$scope.myModule = "Hello world";
});

Memahami Scope


	

		Hello, {{ greet1 }}

Controller

"Controller merupakan application logic yang berfungsi untuk menjembatani data source dengan view"

angular.module('myApp')
	.controller('MyController', function($scope,MyService){
		//set title model text
		$scope.title = "Welcome to My Blog";

		//do some AJAX Request and assign the result 
		//when ready to the posts model
		MyService.getPosts().success(function(result){
			$scope.posts = result.data;
		});
	});

Directive

"Directive merupakan custom html tag yang berfungsi sebagai node dalam DOM yang nantinya akan digantikan oleh tag HTML lain (template)"


	



angular.module('myApp')
.directive('myDirective', function(){
	return {
		restrict: 'E',
		template:'
Hello World
'
	}
});
